anya-e1001n2:2_0: Nīti sāro manussānaṁ, mitto ācariyopi ca;
anya-e1001n2:3_0: Mātā pitā ca nītimā, sutavā ganthakārako.
anya-e1001n2:5_0: Alasassa kuto sippaṁ, asippassa kuto dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:6_0: Adhanassa kuto mittaṁ, amittassa kuto sukhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:7_0: Asukhassa kuto puññaṁ, apuññassa kuto varaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:21_0: Sippasamaṁ dhanaṁ natthi, sippaṁ corā na gaṇhare;
anya-e1001n2:22_0: Idha loke sippaṁ mittaṁ, paraloke sukhāvahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:24_0: Bhuñjanatthaṁ kathanatthaṁ, mukhaṁ hotīti no vade;
anya-e1001n2:25_0: Yaṁ vātaṁ vā mukhāruḷhaṁ, vacanaṁ paṇḍito naro.
anya-e1001n2:27_0: Dummedhehi pasaṁsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e1001n2:31_0: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:33_0: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:47_0: Paṇḍite ca guṇā sabbe, mūḷhe dosā hi kevalaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:55_0: Dhanañca naṁ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahu.
anya-e1001n2:57_0: Vijjā dadāti vinayaṁ, vinayā yāti pattataṁ;
anya-e1001n2:58_0: Pattattā dhanaṁ pappoti, dhanā dhammaṁ tato sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:61_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṁsā, samparāye ca suggatiṁ.
anya-e1001n2:64_0: Attanīva sabbabhūtesu, yo passati so paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:69_0: Passāmi vohaṁ attānaṁ, yathā icchiṁ tathā ahu.
anya-e1001n2:77_0: Kiṁ kulena visālena, guṇahīno tu yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:81_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:84_0: Vijjāhīnā na sobhante, niggandhā iva kiṁ sukā.
anya-e1001n2:87_0: Sūrappabhāya ādāso, chāyaṁ disse na mākare.
anya-e1001n2:95_0: Mahātejopi tejoyaṁ, mattikaṁ na muduṁ kare;
anya-e1001n2:98_0: Kottho puttena jātena, yo na vidū na dhammiko;
anya-e1001n2:99_0: Kāṇena cakkhunā kiṁ vā, cakkhu pīḷeva kevalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:101_0: Mudunāva ripuṁ jeti, mudunā jeti dāruṇaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:102_0: No na siddhaṁ mudu kiñci, tato ca mudunā jaye.
anya-e1001n2:104_0: Sajāto yena jātena, yāti vaṁso samunnatiṁ;
anya-e1001n2:105_0: Parivattinisaṁsāre, mato ko vā na jāyate.
anya-e1001n2:107_0: Dāne tapasi sūre ca, yassa na patthito yaso;
anya-e1001n2:110_0: Varo eko guṇī putto, na ca mūḷhasatānyapi;
anya-e1001n2:111_0: Eko cando tamo hanati, na ca tārāgaṇo tathā.
anya-e1001n2:114_0: Tassa putto bhave vasso, samiddho dhammiko suddhe.
anya-e1001n2:117_0: Pattetu soḷase vasse, puttaṁ mittaṁva ācare.
anya-e1001n2:119_0: Lālane bahavo dosā, tālane bahavo guṇā;
anya-e1001n2:120_0: Tasmā puttañca sissañca, tālaye na tu lālaye.
anya-e1001n2:123_0: Etesu kovido pañño, dhīro pāḷiṁ visodhaye.
anya-e1001n2:128_0: Candanaṁ sītalaṁ loke, candikā sītalā tato;
anya-e1001n2:146_0: Satesu jāyate sūro, sahassesu ca paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n2:147_0: Vuttā satasahassesu, dātā bhavati vā na vā.
anya-e1001n2:150_0: Sadese pūjito rājā, vidvā sabbattha pūjito.
anya-e1001n2:153_0: Asataṁ pana sabbesaṁ, dukkhahetu na saṁsayo.
anya-e1001n2:155_0: Paṇḍite sujane sante, sabbepi sujanā janā;
anya-e1001n2:159_0: Vinītaṁ yanti sabbepi, ko taṁ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:164_0: Ambuṁ pivanti no najjo, rukkho khādati no phalaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:165_0: Megho kvacipi no sassaṁ, paratthāya sataṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:170_0: Sataṁ pharusavācāhi, na yāti vikatiṁ mano;
anya-e1001n2:171_0: Tiṇukkāhi na sakkāva, tāpetuṁ sāgare jalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:173_0: Selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati;
anya-e1001n2:180_0: Anuyyogena telāni, tilehi na sakkā laddhuṁ.
anya-e1001n2:182_0: Yathā hyekena cakkena, na rathassa pati bhave;
anya-e1001n2:183_0: Evaṁ purisakārena, vinā kammaṁ na sijjhati.
anya-e1001n2:185_0: Uyyāmena hi sijjhanti, kāriyāni na manorathaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:186_0: Na hi suttassa sīhassa, pavisanti migāmukhe.
anya-e1001n2:191_0: Mātā sattu pitā verī, yena bālo na pāṭhito;
anya-e1001n2:192_0: Na sobhate sabhāmajjhe, haṁsamajjhe bako yathā.
anya-e1001n2:204_0: Byasanena ca mūḷhānaṁ, nidāya kalahena vā.
anya-e1001n2:208_0: Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:212_0: Na hi saṁharate jutiṁ, cando caṇḍālavesme.
anya-e1001n2:214_0: Yatra vidvajjano natthi, sīlāghyo tatra appadhipi;
anya-e1001n2:217_0: Ṭhānabhaṭṭhā na sobhante, dantā kesā nakhā narā;
anya-e1001n2:228_0: Tādisaṁ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n2:231_0: Khippaṁ dhammaṁ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:233_0: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;
anya-e1001n2:234_0: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṁ kulaṁ sukha medhati.
anya-e1001n2:240_0: Bhattaṁ ukkhaliyaṁ pakkaṁ, bhājanepi tathā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:248_0: Sele sele na maṇikaṁ, gaje gaje na muttikaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:249_0: Vane vane na candanaṁ, ṭhāne ṭhāne na paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:251_0: Paṇḍito sutasampanno, yattha atthīti ce suto;
anya-e1001n2:254_0: Potthakesu ca yaṁ sippaṁ, parahatthesu yaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:255_0: Yathākicce samuppanne, na taṁ sippaṁ na taṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:257_0: Uppalena jalaṁ jaññā, kiriyāya kulaṁ naro;
anya-e1001n2:264_0: Appassuto sutaṁ appaṁ, bahuṁ maññati mānavā;
anya-e1001n2:267_0: Paṭhame sippaṁ gaṇheyya, eseyya dutiye dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:268_0: Careyya tatiye dhammaṁ, esā janāna dhammatā.
anya-e1001n2:271_0: Paññāya atthaṁ jānāti, attho ñāto sukhāvaho.
anya-e1001n2:273_0: Natthi vijjāsamaṁ mittaṁ, na ca byādhisamo ripu;
anya-e1001n2:274_0: Na ca atthasamaṁ pemaṁ, na ca kammasamaṁ balaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:276_0: Vinā satthaṁ na gaccheyya, sūro saṅgāmabhūmiyaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:285_0: Haṁso majjhe na kākānaṁ, sīho gunnaṁ na sobhate;
anya-e1001n2:289_0: Attānurūpakaṁ kodhaṁ, yo jānāti sa paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:292_0: Appapūro ghaṭo khobhe, appakhīrā gāvī cale.
anya-e1001n2:294_0: Na titti rājā dhanamhi, paṇḍitopi subhāsite;
anya-e1001n2:295_0: Cakkhupi piyadassane, na titti sāgaro jale.
anya-e1001n2:300_0: Yo sisso sippalobhena, bahuṁ gaṇhāti taṁ sippaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:301_0: Mūgova supinaṁ passaṁ, kathetumpi na ussahe.
anya-e1001n2:303_0: Na bhijjetuṁ kumbhakāro, sobhetuṁ kumbha ghaṭati;
anya-e1001n2:310_0: Vāsitaṁ kānanaṁ sabbaṁ, suputtena kulaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:312_0: Iṇakattā pitā sattu, mātā ca byabhicārinī;
anya-e1001n2:313_0: Bhariyā rūpavatī sattu, putto sattu apaṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:326_0: Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṁ, tattha tattha vipassati;
anya-e1001n2:329_0: Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṁ nātivattati;
anya-e1001n2:335_0: Dullabhaṁ pākatikaṁ vākyaṁ, dullabho khemakaro suto;
anya-e1001n2:336_0: Dullabhā sadisī jāyā, dullabho sajano piyo.
anya-e1001n2:344_0: Apuṭṭho paṇḍito bherī, pajjunno hoti pucchito;
anya-e1001n2:345_0: Bālo puṭṭho apuṭṭho ca, bahuṁ vikatthate sadā.
anya-e1001n2:349_0: Cakkhumāssa yathā andho, sotavā badhiro yathā;
anya-e1001n2:354_0: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:359_0: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇābhiyyo na maññati;
anya-e1001n2:360_0: Karaṁ purisakiccāni, so sukhaṁ na vihāyati.
anya-e1001n2:362_0: Yasmiṁdese na sammāno, na piyo na ca bandhavo;
anya-e1001n2:363_0: Na ca vijjāgamo koci, na tattha divasaṁ vase.
anya-e1001n2:365_0: Dhanavā sutavā rājā, nadī vajjo ime pañca;
anya-e1001n2:366_0: Yattha dese na vijjanti, na tattha divasaṁ vase.
anya-e1001n2:368_0: Nabhassa bhūsanaṁ cando, nārīnaṁ bhūsanaṁ pati;
anya-e1001n2:369_0: Chamāya bhūsanaṁ rājā, vijjā sabbassa bhūsanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:371_0: Sukhatthiko sace vijjaṁ, vijjatthiko caje sukhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:372_0: Sukhatthino kuto vijjā, kuto vijjatthino sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:375_0: Khaṇacāge kuto vijjā, kaṇacāge kato dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:380_0: Dhammo jaye no adhammo, saccaṁ jayati nāsaccaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:381_0: Khamā jayati no kodho, devo jayati nāsūro.
anya-e1001n2:383_0: Hatthassa bhūsanaṁ dānaṁ, saccaṁ kaṇṭhassa bhūsanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:384_0: Sotassa bhūsanaṁ satthaṁ, bhūsane kiṁ payojanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:386_0: Videsetu dhanaṁ vijjā, byasanesu dhanaṁ mati;
anya-e1001n2:387_0: Paraloke dhanaṁ dhammo, sīlaṁ sabbattha ve dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:389_0: Padose dīpako cando, pabhāte dīpako ravi;
anya-e1001n2:393_0: Na hi vañjhā vijānāti, guruṁ pasavavedanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:395_0: Yassa natthi sayaṁ paññā, satthaṁ tassa karoti kiṁ;
anya-e1001n2:398_0: Kiṁ karissanti vattāro, sotaṁ yattha na vijjate;
anya-e1001n2:404_0: Natthi attasamaṁ pemaṁ, natthi dhaññasamaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:405_0: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā.
anya-e1001n2:410_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ atthamattano;
anya-e1001n2:411_0: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, dhīro saddhaṁ nivesaye.
anya-e1001n2:413_0: Guṇo seṭṭhaṅgataṁ yāti, na ucce sayane vase;
anya-e1001n2:414_0: Pāsādasikhare vāso, kāko kiṁ garuḷo siyā.
anya-e1001n2:417_0: Āgatañca bhayaṁ disvā, abhīto hoti paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:420_0: Malaṁ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṁ, pamādo rakkhato malaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:422_0: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṁ thokaṁ khaṇe khaṇe;
anya-e1001n2:425_0: Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṁ na kayirā na taṁ vade;
anya-e1001n2:429_0: Pantho ca saṅgāmo titthaṁ, aṭṭhete parivajjiyā.
anya-e1001n2:431_0: Rattoduṭṭho ca muḷho ca, mānī luddho tathālaso;
anya-e1001n2:432_0: Ekacintī ca bālo ca, ete atthavināsakā.
anya-e1001n2:434_0: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhīru āmisagaruko;
anya-e1001n2:435_0: Itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako ca, navamo dārakopi ca.
anya-e1001n2:437_0: Navate puggalā loke, ittarā calitā calā;
anya-e1001n2:438_0: Etehi mantitaṁ guyhaṁ, khippaṁ bhavati pākaṭaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:440_0: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:441_0: Pade pade vikaṅkheyya, vane andhagajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:455_0: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:460_0: Āhāre byavahāre ca, cattalajjo sadā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:465_0: Jaheyya pāpake mitte, bhajeyya paṇḍite jane;
anya-e1001n2:469_0: Yādisaṁ vappate bījaṁ, tādisaṁ harate phalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:471_0: Chando nidānaṁ gāthānaṁ, akkharā tāsaṁ viyañjanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:474_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ hitamattano;
anya-e1001n2:477_0: Dhīraṁ passe suṇe dhīraṁ, dhīrena sahasaṁvase;
anya-e1001n2:480_0: Nayaṁ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṁ na yuñjati;
anya-e1001n2:481_0: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1001n2:482_0: Vinayaṁ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
anya-e1001n2:498_0: Tathā sakalavijjānaṁ, dhammassa ca dhanassa ca.
anya-e1001n2:500_0: Paṇḍitā dukkhaṁ patvāna, na bhavanti visādino;
anya-e1001n2:501_0: Pavissa rāhuno mukhaṁ, kiṁ no deti puna sasī.
anya-e1001n2:503_0: Javena assaṁ jānanti, vāhena ca balibaddhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:506_0: Manasā cintitaṁ kammaṁ, vacasā na pakāsaye;
anya-e1001n2:509_0: Anabhyāse visaṁ vijjā, ajiṇṇe bhojanaṁ visaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:510_0: Visaṁ sabhā daliddassa, vuddhassa taruṇī visaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:511_0: Cattāro pañca ālope, ābhutvā udakaṁ pive;
anya-e1001n2:514_0: Yassa eso pasutopi, guṇavā pujjate naro;
anya-e1001n2:524_0: Na vade dakādī natthīti, mukhe ca vacanaṁ tathā.
anya-e1001n2:526_0: Sabbaṁ suṇāti sotena, sabbaṁ passati cakkhunā;
anya-e1001n2:527_0: Na ca diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ dhīro, sabbaṁ uccitu marahati.
anya-e1001n2:532_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ attamattano;
anya-e1001n2:533_0: Yoniso vicine dhammaṁ, evaṁ tattha visujjhati.
anya-e1001n2:536_0: Ārohati na yo saka-vaṁsaagge dhajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:544_0: Narattaṁ dullabhaṁ loke, vijjā tatra sudullabhā;
anya-e1001n2:545_0: Kavittaṁ dullabhaṁ tatra, satti tatra sudullabhā.
